Text: Weakened by decades of mismanagement and an excessive local exposure, Carige has piled up more than 1.6 billion euros in losses since 2014, mostly due to bad loans.
Effect: Weakened by decades of mismanagement and an excessive local exposure, Carige has piled up more than 1.6 billion euros in losses since 2014
Sentence: <e2>Weakened by decades of mismanagement and an excessive local exposure, Carige has piled up more than 1.6 billion euros in losses since 2014</e2>, mostly due to <e1>bad loans.</e1>
